title: Adding local sibling seems to fail, than is considered known.

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
#### What is the problem?
Adding local sibling seems to fail, than is considered known.
```
[dorian@mri freesurfer]$ datalad siblings add --inherit --name mandy --url '/DATA/dass/NewProcess/FEDERATED_DATASETS/STUDY1/data/processed/freesurfer/'
CommandError: command '['git-annex', 'wanted', 'mandy']' failed with exitcode 1
Failed to run ['git-annex', 'wanted', 'mandy'] under '/DATA/dorian/dataladtest/mergetest/FEDERATED_DATASETS/STUDY1/data/processed'. Exit code=1. out= err=git-annex: there is no available git remote named "mandy"

git-annex: there is no available git remote named "mandy"
[dorian@mri freesurfer]$ datalad siblings add --inherit -s mandy --url '/DATA/dass/NewProcess/FEDERATED_DATASETS/STUDY1/data/processed/freesurfer/'
[ERROR  ] sibling is already known: mandy, use `configure` instead? [add-sibling(/DATA/dorian/dataladtest/mergetest/FEDERATED_DATASETS/STUDY1/data/processed/freesurfer)]
[dorian@mri freesurfer]$ datalad siblings add --inherit --name mandy --url '/DATA/dass/NewProcess/FEDERATED_DATASETS/STUDY1/data/processed/freesurfer/'
[ERROR  ] sibling is already known: mandy, use `configure` instead? [add-sibling(/DATA/dorian/dataladtest/mergetest/FEDERATED_DATASETS/STUDY1/data/processed/freesurfer)]
[dorian@mri freesurfer]$
```
#### What steps will reproduce the problem?
Try to run the above commands to add local-path siblings.

#### What version of DataLad are you using (run `datalad --version`)? On what operating system (consider running `datalad wtf`)?
0.12.0rc6

#### Is there anything else that would be useful to know in this context?
No

#### Have you had any success using DataLad before? (to assess your expertise/prior luck.  We would welcome your testimonial additions to https://github.com/datalad/datalad/wiki/Testimonials as well)
NA
